text:
This happens even for some JSP examples bundled with tomcat itself, for example
the "JSP configuration" JSP 2.0 example:

After doing:

mkdir -p
/home/www/gra/jakarta-tomcat-5.5.9/work/Catalina/localhost/jsp-examples/org/apache/jsp/jsp2/misc

and SHIFT-reloading the page, it is shown properly.

remm@apache.org
text: This works for me. Permission issue ? Please post to tomcat-user instead.
